name: Water Bottle Flip - 2017
description:
The best and the hardest water bottle flip challenge ever !


How To Play :

- Swipe up to throw the bottles.
- Land with bottle's bottom and you'll get 1 point.

Features :

- The best water bottle flip challenge ever. Of course!
- Brand new messenger game and the hardest messenger game ever !
- Not just water bottle. This is much more !
- 36 different bottles with real physic effect and awesome graphics.
- You don't have to unlock bottles to play. They're all available for you to play for free without any limit.

Compete with your friends on mobile.
Look very simple but can make you mad. So be careful !!!

Have fun !
